refundRequestId.description:
The unique ID assigned by a merchant to identify a refund request. refundRequestId and refundId cannot both be null. Special characters are not supported. If both refundRequestId and refundId are specified, refundId takes precedence.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

refundId.description:
The unique ID assigned by Antom to identify a refund. refundRequestId and refundId cannot both be null. A one-to-one correspondence between refundId and refundRequestId exists. If both refundRequestId and refundId are specified, refundId takes precedence.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

result.description:
The request result contains information such as status and error codes.

Note: This field does not indicate the refund result. This field only indicates whether the inquiryRefund interface is called successfully.

refundId.description:
The unique ID assigned by Antom to identify a refund. A one-to-one correspondence between refundId and refundRequestId exists.

Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U.

refundRequestId.description:
The unique ID assigned by the merchant to identify a refund request.

Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U. 

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

refundAmount.description:
The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U.

refundStatus.description:
Indicates the final status of the Antom refund, not the Alipay+ Mobile Payment Provider (Alipay+ payment methods) side. Valid values are:  

SUCCESS: Indicates the refund is successful. 
PROCESSING: Indicates the refund is still under process. 
FAIL: Indicates the refund failed.
Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U. 

More information:

Maximum length: 16 characters

refundTime.description:
The date and time when the refund reaches a final state of success on the Antom side, not the Alipay+ Mobile Payment Provider (Alipay+ payment methods) side. 

Note: This field is returned when the value of refundStatus is SUCCESS.

More information:

The value follows the ISO 8601 standard format. For example, "2019-11-27T12:01:01+08:00".

grossSettlementAmount.description:
The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U.

settlementQuote.description:
The exchange rate between the settlement currency and payment currency.

Note: This field is returned when grossSettlementAmount is returned.

refundRequestId.description:
The unique ID assigned by a merchant to identify a refund request. refundRequestId and refundId cannot both be null. Special characters are not supported. If both refundRequestId and refundId are specified, refundId takes precedence.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

The unique ID assigned by Antom to identify a refund. refundRequestId and refundId cannot both be null. A one-to-one correspondence between refundId and refundRequestId exists. If both refundRequestId and refundId are specified, refundId takes precedence.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

Note: This field does not indicate the refund result. This field only indicates whether the inquiryRefund interface is called successfully.

Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U.

refundStatus.description:
Indicates the final status of the Antom refund, not the Alipay+ Mobile Payment Provider (Alipay+ payment methods) side. Valid values are:  

SUCCESS: Indicates the refund is successful. 
PROCESSING: Indicates the refund is still under process. 
FAIL: Indicates the refund failed.
Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U.

refundTime.description:
The date and time when the refund reaches a final state of success on the Antom side, not the Alipay+ Mobile Payment Provider (Alipay+ payment methods) side. 

Note: This field is returned when the value of refundStatus is SUCCESS.

More information:

The value follows the ISO 8601 standard format. For example, "2019-11-27T12:01:01+08:00".

grossSettlementAmount.description:
The refund amount that is initiated by the merchant.

Note: This field is null when the refund record cannot be found, or result.resultStatus is F or U.

settlementQuote.description:
The exchange rate between the settlement currency and payment currency.

Note: This field is returned when grossSettlementAmount is returned.

currency.description:
The 3-letter currency code that follows the ISO 4217 standard. 

More information:

Maximum length: 3 characters

value.description:
The amount to charge as a positive integer in the smallest currency unit. For example, $1.00 should be charged as 100 cents to charge USD 1.00, or 100 to charge JPY 100, a 0-decimal currency.

Note: For more information about the smallest currency unit, see Currency codes for details.

More information:

Value range: 1 - unlimited

quoteId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by Antom to identify an exchange rate.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

quoteCurrencyPair.description:
The exchange rate between settlement currency and transaction currency. Two currencies are separated with a slash and use the 3-letter ISO-4217 currency code.

More information:

Maximum length: 16 characters

quotePrice.description:
The exchange rate used when a currency conversion between settlement currency and transaction currency occurs.

More information:

Value range: 1 - unlimited

quoteStartTime.description:
The effective time of the exchange rate. 

More information:

The value follows the ISO 8601 standard format. For example, "2019-11-27T12:01:01+08:00".

quoteExpiryTime.description:
The expiration time of the exchange rate. 

More information:

The value follows the ISO 8601 standard format. For example, "2019-11-27T12:01:01+08:00".

guaranteed.description: Guaranteed exchange rate available for payment.

acquirerName.description:
The name of the acquirer. 

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.  

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerMerchantName.description: 收单机构商户名称（PD反馈不公开）

referenceRequestId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by APO to identify a payment request sent to the acquirer.

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.  

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerTransactionId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by the acquirer to identify a transaction. 

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerMerchantId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by the acquirer to identify a merchant. 

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.  

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerResultCode.description:
The acquirer's result code that indicates the transaction process result.  

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

acquirerResultMessage.description:
The result message that describes acquirerResultCode in detail.  

Note: This parameter is returned if you integrate the APO product.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

resultCode.description:
Result code

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

resultStatus.description:
Result status. Valid values are:  

S: Indicates that the result status is successful. 
F: Indicates that the result status is failed. 
U: Indicates that the result status is unknown. 
More information:

Maximum length: 1 character

resultMessage.description:
Result message

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters
